original_text: They rest in the shadow of the thorn trees, and among the willow trees beside the water. They rest in the shadow of the thorn trees, and among the willow trees beside the water. They rest in the shadow of the thorn trees,
korean_text: 연 잎 그늘이 덮으며 시내 버들이 그를 감싸는도다

sentences.original_text: They rest in the shadow of the thorn trees
and among the willow trees beside the water
They rest in the shadow of the thorn trees
and among the willow trees beside the water
They rest in the shadow of the thorn trees
